#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long n,q,qs[5001],qe[5001],i,j,t,k,qi,p;

    cin>>t;
    for(k=1;k<=t;k++)
    {
        cin>>n>>q;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
            cin>>qs[i]>>qe[i];

        for(i=1;i<=q;i++)
        { p=1;
            cin>>qi;
            for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
                if(qi>=qs[j]&&qi<=qe[j])
            {
                p=0;
                break;
            }
            if(p==1)
                cout<<"YES"<<endl;
            else
                cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        }

    }

}
